title: Siba.pro
description:
Siba.Pro Ã¢â‚¬â€œ is a project from Moscow, Russia, uniting artists Ã¢â‚¬â€œ musicians, vocalists, performers Ã¢â‚¬â€œ around itself. They bestow a part of their souls upon the listener,  they convey something that is kind, cherished, nostalgic, bright and sometimes dreary.
The creation of songs without words happens in the end, where melodies, tunes of musical instruments and voices make an impression of lyrics. None of the languages of the world is capable of expressing feelings and emotions so clearly and fully as the melody. Music of Siba.Pro porject belongs to the following genres: Russian downtempo, trip-hop, instrumental, easylisten.

He graduated from music educational institution specializing in clarinet as well as from school of theatre arts, he had been working for 3 years as an actor at the Ã¢â‚¬Å“GlobusÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ theatre, Novosibirsk, and after that he moved to Moscow in order to devote himself seriously to his dear project Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Siba.Pro. Live concerts are performed both solo and with specially invited musicians.
